text: My music isn't anything but me. It has jazz in it, and rock'n'roll, and it has an urgency to it.
author: Neil Young

text: The '60s was one of the first times the power of music was used by a generation to bind them together.
author: Neil Young

text: The thing about my music is, there really is no point.
author: Neil Young

text: Commitments are one of the worst things to have in the music business. They're very annoying.
author: Neil Young

text: Music is part of us, and either ennobles or degrades our behavior.
author: Boethius
